title: New: Silence Dogood – Misrepresented
body:
Michigan’s **Silence Dogood** have that ‘don’t give a fxxk about recording quality’ aesthetic that for some bizarre reason is wholly endearing.

Fuzzy guitars, raw vocals and booming chorus’s form a slightly aggressive **Wavves**\-esque anthem, bursting at the seams with teenage angst and sense of all-too-real despair. _Misrepresented_ is the first track to be taken from **Silence Dogood’s** forthcoming debut release, check it out below. _“When you ate from the Tree of Good and Evil, we all knew we were doomed, and now our eyes are closed, but I can’t seem to fall asleep”_
